name: Baymesh 915MHz Cavity Band Pass Filter
notes: Hand-tuned cavity BPF for 902-928MHz LoRa, ~0.4-1.2dB insertion loss, 60+dB out-of-band rejection — outperforms commercial filters. Available in 3/4/5-cavity variants. Each unit shipped with individual VNA test results.

name: USB-C 2-in-1 Splitter Y Cable (Female to 2 Male)
